Plot: A troubled boy dives into a wonderous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.
Title: The NeverEnding Story
Writer: Wolfgang Petersen (screenplay), Herman Weigel (screenplay), Michael Ende (novel), Robert Easton (additional dialogue)
Actors: Barret Oliver, Gerald McRaney, Chris Eastman, Darryl Cooksey
tomatoConsensus: A magical journey about the power of a young boy's imagination to save a dying fantasy land, The NeverEnding Story remains a much-loved kids adventure.
